org.funcito
Class FuncitoJedi

java.lang.Object
  org.funcito.FuncitoJedi

public class FuncitoJedi
extends Object

This class is the static entry point of the Funcito API for Jedi.

Method Detail

callsTo

public static <T> T callsTo(Class<T> clazz)
Generates a stub object for use with other FuncitoJedi static calls. This stub should not be used for any other purposes. An example of proper usage is as follows:

MyClass callsTo = callsTo(MyClass.class);
Functor func = functorFor( callsTo.noArgMethodWithRetType() );

Stubs are cached, this method can be called multiple times for the same class without penalty. But a single stub can also be reused for creating multiple Jedi Functor or Filter objects.

Parameters:
clazz - is the class to be stubbed
Returns:
a stub which can be used by other FuncitoJedi static calls

functorFor

public static <T,V> Functor<T,V> functorFor(V stubbedMethodCall)
Generates a Jedi Functor object that wraps a method call. Resulting Functor is as thread-safe as the method itself.

Parameters:
stubbedMethodCall - is the return value from a method call to a FuncitoJedi callsTo object
Returns:
a Jedi Functor object that wraps the method call.

filterFor

public static <T> Filter<T> filterFor(Boolean stubbedMethodCall)
Generates a Jedi Filter object that wraps a boolean-return method call. Resulting Filter is as thread-safe as the method itself. Methods returning either boolean primitive or Boolean wrapper objects may be wrapped without problems.

Parameters:
stubbedMethodCall - is the return value from a method call to a FuncitoJedi stub object
Returns:
a Jedi Filter object that wraps the method call.

delegate

public static JediDelegate delegate()
